desc: Agricultural, greasing and domestic cleaning and laundry products. Also fuel and tyre repair gear, farm tools and general components for the farm workshop.

layout.text:
McDermott Rural Supplies is a family owned company specialising in supplying the farming community with environmentally and farm friendly agricultural, greasing and domestic cleaning and laundry products. As well as fuel and tyre repair gear, farm tools and general components for the farm workshop.
In addition to our online store, we carry our quality product range in our on-farm service vehicles, which cover a wide area of Southern NSW and Northern Victoria.
The Shires we cover include:
Bland, Boorowa, Cootamundra, Greater Hume, Weddin, Harden, Lockhart, Temora, Upper Lachlan, Yass, Corowa, Coolamon, Griffith, Junee, Narrandera, Tumbarumba, Urana, Young, Corryong, Gundagai, Leeton, Tumut, Wagga Wagga and North East Victoria. 
 If you would like us to call on your farm, house or business, or if you would like more information, please call or drop an email.
